title: Dynamic Metabolite Profile Changes in Semen Ziziphi Spinosae During Ripening.
abstract: In traditional Chinese medicine, Semen Ziziphi Spinosae (SZS) is employed for alleviating conditions such as neurasthenia, sleep disorders, and anxiety. Its therapeutic effects are attributed to an abundance of biologically active compounds. The main objective of this study was the comparative profiling of SZS from different harvest times using a widely targeted metabolomics approach.
journal: Rapid communications in mass spectrometry : RCM
